Preference.android:title: Why there is a gap between the dock and the buttom of the phone?
Preference.android:summary: There's a gap between because normally there it should be the nav bar, and unfortunally the gap cannot be took it off

Preference.android:title: I didn't really understand the thing with revisions and releases
Preference.android:summary: I wanted to apply the revision method because i want to offer to the user small patches and fixes without making a full entire release in order to keep the user updated. Normally the revisions are 5 for each Release and after that the Release will also switch (For ex. Release 1 Revision 5 will become Release 2 Revision 1

Preference.android:title: Why i cannot apply themes on this ROM?
Preference.android:summary: Because i'm making my own one directly in the ROM and for the fact that this ROM should remain an Xperia based one there is no reason to include also Theme Chooser

Preference.android:title: Are we gonna see a M based?
When i apply a wallpaper the phone reboot
Preference.android:summary: Yes, this is a known bug, but it's just soft rebooting and in the end the wallpaper is applied as well. For the M based this bug will be fixed

Preference.android:title: If i set-up an allarm from the Clock app when the allarm should trigger the app force closes itself
Preference.android:summary: Yes, that's another known bug but the bad thing here is that this is an unfixable bug for my knowledge so it will remain as it is for now,so if you use allarm just use a third party app
